direction.raw_text: Rae kisses Laz. He is motionless at first, allowing it to happen. His hand moves from the neck of his guitar to the bend in her neck. The passion intensifies as they squeeze the guitar between them. Laz pulls his lips away and holds her head in his hands. They are so close, they are breathing into each other's mouths.

direction.raw_text: The guitar clangs to the floor as Laz lifts Rae in his arms. They kiss, ravenous for each other. He knocks up against the side table, causing his Bible to fall to the floor, face up and open. The wind pushes the front door open, slamming it hard against the wall. They turn together, kissing, Laz slowly spinning with Rae in his arms. But Laz is soon distracted by the pages of his Bible fluttering on the floor. The wind is blowing the pages, turning them with an unseen hand.

direction.raw_text: Rae is struggling for breath. She desperately grabs at Laz.

Laz holds her. Rae's open mouth quivers as the sensation peaks. Her shoulders slump, her chest vibrates. She is crying softly.

dialogue.raw_text: All my life people called me shit like, sissy and... nervous and... I got few things in my life that make me feel like... like...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Like a man.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (surprised) Yes. I mean that's it. I wanna feel like a man with her. I wanna feel like the only man with her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It starts like this... fire... that spreads. Starts in my head. Then moves to my stomach. Then it goes lower. I can stop it sometimes but mostly I just jump on and ride it out... then everything'll go back to normal, you know. Only thing ever took that feeling away was... was... when I met Ronnie. (the emotion really hits hard) Cuz I love him so much. He's all I got in my life that's special. And I like taking care of him and helping him when he gets nervous. When I can do that for him... it's like I'm givin' somethin' of myself that I haven't givin' nobody else. R.L. Rae, look at Ronnie. And tell him how you feel.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I think... I think we're fucked up. Both of us. I know I am. But... that don't mean what I feel ain't true. It don't mean I can't love. And I know, how I been is... is... REALLY BAD! So if you want to quit on me... I understand. But please... please... don't.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . ANGELA'S HOME - DAY The door opens. Angela looks surprised to see Laz. She is dressed in jeans, a T-shirt, wearing rubber gloves from cleaning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Angela notices Rae and Ronnie seated in Laz's truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Angela takes a breath and opens the door wider.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hey.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey. You wasn't at'cha work but that nosey gal up at the counter give me your home address. Hope you don't mind me comin' over.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do you need?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I need ya help again.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: More cough syrup?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Can I come in?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . ANGELA'S HOME - DAY It is a small house, but tidy. Angela motions for Laz to sit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Angela thinks on this. She rises out of her seat and crosses to Laz, sitting next to him on the love seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They stay locked in each others' sight. Then, the slowest, most gentle kiss happens between them. When they separate, Laz is lost in her eyes.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I lied to you. It was wrong. But at the time... I didn't know what to do. Imagine you got an earful from folks about that gal I's carryin'...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Laz... you don't need to explain yourself to me...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, I do. Cuz I feel for you. Mean to say... (long pause) I got feelings for you. And I didn't want you to think... I didn't... (how to say?) I don't want you to go away. There's better ways to say what I'm trying to say, but... they it is. Don't go away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Laz. I'm gonna put my trust in you. I'm gonna do it knowin' all too well I can get hurt like this. And I have been hurt. Just like you. (beat) Woman like me, I got a lot of livin' to do. But my days are precious to me. They all I got left. Don't want no more fuss. I want love in my life. You understanding me, Laz?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I do. God's truth. I do.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Now what'chu need me to do? Cuz I'm gonna go do it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Laz enters the pool hall and spots Tehronne. Tehronne motions him back. Next to Tehronne is an old black man named PINETOP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pinetop grins and produces a black velvet cloth. He opens it gently and spreads it out, revealing a long, thin, gold chain. Laz nods, approvingly.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Yo, this here Pinetop. I think he got what you lookin' for.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That'll do.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Tehronne leads Laz down the back steps. They both round the corner, revealing an old Chevy Caprice. It is light brown except for one door that is gray, however the chrome rims on the car are impressive -- worth more that the entire car by a long shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tehronne walks back into the pool hall, leaving Laz alone.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: It got some miles on it, but my boys say she run good. Got fresh 22's on her. Ain't my doin'. That's just how it came to me. Don't worry. Nobody gonna come lookin' for it. I got the pinks... got no problem. (hands Laz the keys) Ain't gonna have my girl ridin' no bus.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (moved, impressed) Don't see generosity much these days. Everything always got a catch. Guess I'm tryin' to say... thank you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nobody ever asks me to do shit like this for people. And you know what? I'm good at it. Naw what I mean?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Rhonda has three white dresses over her arm as she hurries past Ronnie, seated next to the back dressing rooms. The door doesn't close all the way. He stands and moves in for a peek. Angela pokes her head out and grins.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What are you doing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shrugs) Just wanted to see.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You know the rules. (vacant look from Ronnie) You do know the rules, don't you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, I know.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Then start taking them seriously.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, ma'am.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Rae is standing in bra and panties up on a small platform in front of a tri-divided mirror. Ella Mae takes the dresses from Rhonda. Angela sees that Rae is nervous.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: It's okay to breathe, honey.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, ma'am.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Ronnie is wearing a brown corduroy jacket. He is attempting to tie his neck tie in the side mirror of Laz's truck. Lincoln, also wearing his Sunday best, steps up behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ronnie nods. Lincoln steps behind him to tie the tie.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You Ronnie?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm Lincoln. Guess I'm gonna be your best man.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (ultimately accepting) Okay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You havin' trouble with that tie? Cuz I'm pretty good at it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Gotta do it like this or I get all turned around.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Laz is wearing the same suit he wore at the cafe with Rose. He is seated in Ronnie's trailer, outside the back bedroom door. Angela steps out from the bedroom with a grin.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: She's ready for you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Laz opens the door, carefully looking around the doorjam. He sees her standing before the dresser mirror. She looks beautiful, simple, and elegant. Rae desperately searches Laz's eyes for approval.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rae bows her head. She fights back tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laz holds her face in his hands. He speaks softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His words are piercing and true. Rae nods, decides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R.L.'s words are heard as Rae wraps her arms around Laz and rests her head on his chest.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Now that's sharp. That's real sharp. Miss Ella Mae set you up, didn't she? You like it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've had nice things before but I always ruined 'em somehow.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, this one's yours now. You ready to take care of it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I want to. More'n anything. But I...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Now... let's stop that. (smiles) You and me... we can handle this. You hear me, gal? We gonna be just fine. Now live ya life. Pull your shit together and live your life.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't want you to let go.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Maybe I won't. R.L. (V.O.) When I was a child, I talked like a child. I thought like a child, I reasoned like a child.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Ronnie turns toward the trailer. He is in his suit, standing in his front yard -- Lincoln at his side. R.L. stands to the side with a Bible in his hands. R.L. (V.O.) When I became a man, I put childish ways behind me. Ronnie is amazed with what he sees. Laz leads beautiful Rae down the steps as Angela tends to her side. R.L. (V.O.) Now we see but a poor reflection as in the mirror; then we shall see face to face. I know in part; then I shall know fully, even as I am fully known. Rae holds firm to Laz's arm as they come together on the green grass to witness and perform this union. R.L. (V.O.) And now these three remain: faith, hope and love. But the greatest of these is love. (Looks to Laz) Who gives this girl in marriage?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lazarus takes a few steps with Rae, offering her arm to Ronnie. Ronnie and Laz stay locked in each other's gaze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laz stands next to Angela as Ronnie and Rae face R.L. together. R.L. Ronnie. Rae. I want you to look at each other and listen to me carefully. Do you understand?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They both obey -- each with a serious expression. R.L. I require and charge you both as you stand in the presence of God to remember that love and loyalty alone will avail as a foundation of a happy and enduring home. (to Lincoln) Go on, hand it to him. Lincoln steps toward Ronnie and holds up the black velvet. Ronnie takes the gold chain and carefully wraps it around Rae's waist. R.L. No human ties are more tender. No vows more sacred than those you now assume. Laz looks on -- a conflicted emotion of joy and loss. R.L. If these solemn vows be kept inviolate, the home which you are establishing will abide in peace and your life will be filled with joy. Angela reaches over and takes Laz's hand in hers.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I do.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You got her now?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: & RONNIE Yes. Yes, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . RONNIE & RAE'S NEW CAR - DAY Ronnie is at the wheel of the Chevy Caprice. Rae sits silently next to him. Rae looks out the window as a huge 18 wheeler rolls up on her side. She tries to ignore it and the tension it brings. She turns to see that Ronnie is sweating. Another truck is on his side sandwiching them in. An attack is coming over Ronnie. His breath is short. His chest tightens. Rae reaches over and gently strokes the back of his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He breaks. The two trucks zoom ahead as Ronnie breaks to the side. Dust flies as the Chevy skids to a stop on the side of the road. Trucks zip by shaking the car, as Ronnie tries to get control of his breathing. Rae tries to stay calm, stroking the back of his neck as he struggles for breath. He puts his forehead against the wheel to stave off the building nausea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fear comes to Rae's face as she notices her middle finger scratching at the back of Ronnie's neck. She pulls it away and shoves her hand between her thighs. Her eyes close as the burning builds. She grips the gold chain around her waist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The chain, tight around Rae as she struggles. Rae panting and sweating on Laz's floor. She reaches out. Her hand lands on the strings of his guitar. A single string is plucked. FLASH BACK TO:
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I gotta pull over.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (through clenched teeth)
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . RONNIE & RAE'S NEW CAR - DAY Rae opens her eyes -- the low note still sounding in her head. She places her hand back on his neck. And then, soft as a prayer:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ronnie slowly turns and looks at Rae, his head still resting on the steering wheel. The panting has slowed. Color starts returning to his cheeks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The anxiety is gone. Ronnie takes a breath and looks at Rae, humbled and thankful of her power to soothe him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rae is smiling.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (singing) You are my sunshine. My only sunshine. You make me happy, when times are gray.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (singing) You'll never know dear, how much I love you. Please don't take, my sunshine away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: See. We're okay.
dialogue.name: dialogue
